column3: Latest;Sihanoukville: (Preliminary information) Authorities said that a foreign man died on August 24
column4: 2020 at 08:30 am. Sangkat 3 Administrative Police Station reported that the man was found in a room (near the airplane building/car museum) in group 27 Village 3
column7: Preah Sihanouk Province.------The man was named as ANDREI NIKITENKO
column8: a Russian aged 54. His visa expired on August 8
column11: and used to work om the premises. He went to work on the islands and became sick and asked the landlord to stay at the scene.------The body is currently being kept at the scene awaiting examination by the technical police.
